document.full_text: the condemned killer of two convenience store employees was executed by lethal injection on tuesday after losing an 11th-hour appeal that raised questions about the origins of drugs used in putting him to death.
document.title: arizona executes condemned killer
lines_and_colors: the condemned killer of two convenience store employees was executed by lethal injection on tuesday after losing an 11th-hour appeal that raised questions about the origins of drugs used in putting him to death.
